Table.tableName: Major toxicities associated with gefitinib treatment
Table.tableFooter: Abbreviations: ILD=interstitial lung disease; ALP=alkaline phosphatase; AST/ALT=aspartate aminotransferase/alanine aminotransferase.

Document.DocumentTitle: A phase II trial of gefitinib as first-line therapy for advanced non-small cell lung cancer with epidermal growth factor receptor mutations
